i first played portal 2 on xbox 360 when i was 9 back in 2014. i absolutely loved it (even if 9 year old me spoiled all the story by watching videos on it but that taught me a valuable lesson called, don't do that). I got my PC in december and portal and portal 2 were already bought. I beat portal 1, and loved it i should write a review on it soon. I just beat portal 2, and it's genuinely amazing to this day. The characters are memorable, the game is so easily quotable, I love the humour of the game. This is an easy recommendation to anyone. I would recommend playing the first portal game (it's only like 2 hours long) but you dont have to. Again this was the first valve game i ever played back on xbox 360 when i was 9 before ever playing the first portal and I loved it. Anyway I should probably try and get a friend to beat the multiplayer with now, I never did that as a kid. Thank you valve, for making a memorable game that I love even after it being almost 7 years since I got this game in August 2014.
a great balance between story action and puzles

This game is so brilliant it's way ahead of its time. I'd never heard of it before as I'm new to PC gaming but I gotta be honest I had very low expectations judging mainly on the release date. Boi was I taken for a ride. 10/10. I wish today's devs would take some notes it's really a shame you hardly find any decent game now a decade later. 

P.S: Play Portal 1 first it's definitely worth it and they are both equally enjoyable.

very good puzzle game but the story is good too

Rated one of the best games on steam, and it deserves it. SUPER developed game with funny character interaction and very unique gameplay. I honestly don't see how valve hasn't made a Half-Life 3 with the geniuses behind this game.
Way better than the first game, and even when you complete the main campaign, There are community made chambers! And if you have a friend, you can do co-op! Basically, buy this game.
amazing singleplayer, and coop is awesome with friends
pretty good. wish i had the portal gun irl.
Great game, interesting story the interaction with the AI was especially funny and of course the prerecorded messages.
Amazing game to play! awesome game to come back  too!!

This is a phenomenal game built off of the great foundation created by the first Portal. The gameplay is innovative, and you are provided with new tools to play with. The puzzles can be difficult and may seem obtuse, however all can be solved by playing around with the tools provided. The story is engaging with memorable characters and great environments. Seeing even more of the Aperture Science facility is amazing. It provides some interesting puzzle opportunities, and expands upon the backstory. There are very few other games out there that will provide an experience like this game.
absolutly incredible game, if you havent played it than please do
If you like lemons (the fruit), you'll like this game.
